article: In my second year of high school, the class was to run the mile. I will always  _  that day because due to the  _  from medical operation on my  _  , for two years I had not worn shorts. I was afraid of being laughed at. Yet that day, it didn't  _  . I was ready  _  , heart and mind. I had  no sooner  got to the starting line than I heard the loud  _  . "How ugly!" I blocked it out. I realized that nobody had  given up  . Everyone had already finished,  _  . As I ran that last lap, I cried.  _  12 minutes 42 seconds after starting I crossed the finish line.
